jobs_results.title: Software Developer (Front End Developer) (1 Year Contract) x 03
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities:

• Involve in the project or lead the project related with IT infrastructure and data centre whenever required.
• Perform Installation, Implementation, Configuration and testing of network equipment & setup
• Plan for migration, document and execute the migration plan
• Develop implementation plan, migration plan and acceptance test plan for the project.
• Conduct acceptance test with users and address the testing findings/issues
• Provide system architecture design and planning for new IT infrastructure deployments in both hosted and cloud environments
• Support maintenance team in difficult or chronic problems, escalate the issue to vendor, identifying the root cause and preventive measures.
• Support presales team on infrastructure solutioning in bids
• Review the project change request and carry out the integration/implementation
• Work closely with Project Managers in planning the implementation tasks
• Develop As-built documentation for... handover

Requirements:

• Degree in Computer Science or IT related studies with at minimum 7 years’ experience in IT industry with at least 5 years in network/systems security arena.
• Knowledge of networking and IP/TCP protocol
• In-depth knowledge in network and systems security issues
• Hands-on experience in security-related tasks such as OS tightening, patching and updating, virus scanning will be an added advantage.
• In-depth knowledge on network and systems security issues and ability to offer advisories and troubleshooting support.
• IT certification in CCNP or equivalent
• Good communication skills and positive working attitude

jobs_results.title: Software Developer
jobs_results.description:
Introduction

Software Developers at IBM are the backbone of our strategic initiatives to design, code, test, and provide industry-leading solutions that make the world run today - planes and trains take off on time, bank transactions complete in the blink of an eye and the world remains safe because of the work our software developers do. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, software development is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of.

Your Role and Responsibilities

Job Description
• Working in HW development area and comfortable working in Linux OS environment
• Gathering data from database using sql command, analyze and interpret the data to make prompt decision
• Working in agile working environment and be able to adept to different project management style
•... Experience working with international or cross-functional teams. The teams are in different timezone ( US, Germany, India, Singapore)
• Gathering new requirement for new product and fit into our current architecture
• Maintaining and improve web based quality management tool (node js, sqlite, react js)
• Improve the user experience for the web interface with users
• Database recovery and make sure the website is up always
• Maintain, create and improve the automation testing that has been implemented (python and perl)
• Write up scripts to do data preparations, analyze and present the result
• Setting up machine environment to do characterization of DCM and running script to collect the experiment results
• Writing problem and following up on open issues that is found during characterization of the DCM

Requirement
• Comfortable to work with remote team
• Project management
• Good analytical skills & experience in performing Root Cause Analysis
• Good knowledge and experience on mainframes
• Fullstack web development is required (node js, sqlite database, react framework and native, express)
• Scripting language perl and python
• Experience of working with technology to deliver complex projects
• Excellent communication, interpersonal and stakeholder management skills with the ability to work with and present to senior stakeholders

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

As shared above.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise

As shared above.

About Business UnitIBM Systems helps IT leaders think differently about their infrastructure. IBM servers and storage are no longer inanimate - they can understand, reason, and learn so our clients can innovate while avoiding IT issues. Our systems power the world’s most important industries and our clients are the architects of the future. Join us to help build our leading-edge technology portfolio designed for cognitive business and optimized for cloud computing.

Your Life @ IBMWhat matters to you when you’re looking for your next career challenge?

Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities – where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible.

Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever.

About IBMIBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries.

Location StatementFor additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBMIBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status

jobs_results.title: Security Systems Programmer
jobs_results.description:
Security Systems Programmer – Security Systems Based Singapore for APJ region significant package available for the right person.

The Company is an iconic brand, fast-paced, expanding significantly, attracting top talent for a major growth programme across the globe. Highly motivated corporation at the cutting edge of business integration who value their people, diversity, and inclusion. The language of the business is English.

The Role is to manage system configuration, programming, integration, and project support for all physical security applications for projects within the EMEA region. These will include standard applications such as; Access Control System, Visitor Identity Management , Video Management , Security Communication , Perimeter Detection , Incident Management , Event Management. You will have worked on enterprise systems and experience with C-Cure or Genetec strongly preferred.

You would be the guardian of compliance with global standards, policies, and procedures... This shall include all city, country or regional governance that may also apply to the system programming, configuration and/or integration as it relates to life safety, general data protection regulations and accessibility/disability requirements for the countries you are responsible for.

You will maintain the highest level of professionalism in all activities to represent the organisation internally and externally while serving as a trusted advisor and ambassador for the Company.

You will :
• Provide expert level programming as it relates to all application configuration, integration, and reporting. Projects include new construction and renovation or system replacements and/or additions.
• Program the main user interface dashboard for all systems to provide effective and efficient situational awareness for all system activity. (alarms, events, response instructions, contact information, etc.)
• Provide ongoing coordination and communication to ensure that all standards, policies, and procedures are current as they relate to region and country requirements.
• Pro-actively identify physical and program security requirements, problems, and sound solutions, imparting expertise of physical security systems, concepts, and infrastructure into the specified facility lifecycle.
• Participate in working groups to identify, examine, negotiate, and resolve physical security mandates, concerns, and issues. Serve as liaison to management, provide reports, champion internal goals and manage system reports, metrics and KPI’s.
• Assist in providing training on all physical security system applications. Including but not limited to the professional services training provided by integration partners, training documentation for all physical security applications, and training management within the region from year to year. All training shall be roles-based, specific to the system training needs of all operators, administrators, and super-users.

The Person

You require a comprehensive understanding of the principles and methods of physical security systems and identify new hardware and software solutions that may be integrated with current physical security standards.
• Experienced in reading and interpreting architectural, reflected ceiling, HVAC and electrical schematics via hard copy and in programs such as AutoCAD or Visio.
• Ability to diagnose, isolate, and resolve physical security system issues as they relate to basic performance, integration, and alarm/event capabilities.
• Manage and execute day to day delivery of multiple technology projects throughout the region.
• Seek to drive design and operational excellence and quality assurance by providing best practices, problem-solving, and guidance within their area of responsibility.
• Proficient in the entire Microsoft Office 365 suite including Word, Excel, Project and PowerPoint for use in managing and reporting on all projects.
• You will have worked for a security system integrator and/or corporate end-user environment, be skilled in developing relationships with key stakeholders. Worked within matrix management, reporting across functional boundaries, gaining trust and comfortable when communicating to senior executives or large groups of colleagues.
• Extensive experience in physical security programming, configuration and integration of enterprise-class access control and video management system platforms. You will hold current certification for the systems that you do/have worked with.
• Language skills particularly those for region you are applying for (desirable), comprehensive English language both written and spoken essential. All applicants will undertake background verification.

Apply now

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer - Back End
jobs_results.description:
Ideal candidate:

● Agile self learner, highly self-motivated with strong sense of product ownership and creative problem solver.
● Deeply passionate about software coding/development and building great web applications.
● Ability to perform independent research to solve complex technical problems.
● Good collaborator and team player, comfortable working in a fast moving, culturallydiverse and globally distributed team environment.

● Currently living in Singapore.

Responsibilities:

● To develop quality programs on assigned tasks and beyond.
● To work as a dev member of a Scrum team together with other dev engineers, QAs andproduct managers.
● To maintain consistency, maintainability, scalability, and performance of the productswhile focusing on customer experience and satisfaction.
● To proactively clarify and understand requirements and estimate work volume.
● To document specification, design and knowledge sharing information.
● To actively take part and contribute in meetings... and workshops.

Minimum qualifications:

● At least 3 years working experience as a software engineer developing Java or Salesforce Apex solutions.
● High coding standards - understanding of test coverage, best practices, clean code.
● Familiar with Agile (Scrum) development.

Preferred qualifications:

● Solid knowledge on Salesforce Apex development.
● Prior experience configuring and developing Salesforce solutions for customers.
● Existing Salesforce certification, preferably Platform Developer 1 or 2

jobs_results.title: Go Lang Programmer
jobs_results.description:
Job Description
We are looking for a Go developer who possesses a strong understanding of how best to leverage and exploit the language’s unique paradigms, idioms, and syntax. Your primary focus will be on developing Go packages and programs that are scalable and maintainable. You will ensure that these Go packages and programs are well documented and has a reasonable test coverage. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. A commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is essential.

Responsibilities

· Writing scalable, robust,, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code

· Translating software requirements into stable, working, high performance software

· Playing a key role in architectural and design decisions, building toward an efficient micro services distributed architecture

Skills

· Strong knowledge of Go programming language, paradigms, constructs, and idioms

·... Knowledge of common Goroutine and channel patterns

· Experience with the full site of Go frameworks and tools, including:

· Dependency management tools such as Godep, Sltr, etc.

· Go’s templating language

· Go’s code generation tools, such as Stringer

· Popular Go web frameworks, such as Revel

· Router packages, such as Gorilla Mux

· Ability to write clean and effective Godoc comments

· Familiarity with code versioning tools {{such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial}

Good to Have skills: AWS, Devops
